## Provide your Datadog credentials

You will need to add the following environment variables in order to use
Datadog in bigbytes:
* DD_API_KEY: your datadog api key
* DD_APP_KEY: your datadog app key

## Using Datadog in Bigbytes

You can now call Datadog helper functions in your Bigbytes blocks to create or update metrics.
You can see the existing helper functions [here](https://github.com/getbigbytes/bigbytes/blob/master/bigbytes/services/datadog/__init__.py).

Example:
```python
from bigbytes.services import datadog as dd

dd.increment('<your metric here>', tags=dict(pipeline='<pipeline_uuid>'))
```
